trans-unit.source: Uses the object security layer of the managed ACL library to wrap access control functionality for directory objects.
trans-unit.target: Usa a camada de segurança do objeto da biblioteca gerenciada ACL para encapsular a funcionalidade de controle de acesso para objetos de diretório.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> object that represents an access right for this object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Type>objeto que representa um acesso à direita para este objeto.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns the <xref:System.Type> of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade sempre retorna o <xref:System.Type>do <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights>enumeração.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the access right.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do direito de acesso.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref> object with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"> </xref> objeto com os valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object such as an NTAccount object that resolves to a security identifier (SID).
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objeto como um objeto NTAccount que resolve para um identificador de segurança (SID).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> bitmask that shows the access privileges to use.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>bitmask que mostra os privilégios de acesso para usar.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> object that indicates whether ACEs are inherited.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Boolean>objeto que indica se as ACEs são herdadas.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ACEs are inherited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as ACEs são herdadas; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref> object that contains inheritance flags on a directory object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"> </xref> objeto que contém os sinalizadores de herança em um objeto de diretório.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref> object that contains inheritance propagation flags on a directory object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"> </xref> objeto que contém sinalizadores de propagação de herança em um objeto de diretório.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> object that contains the ACE type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"> </xref> objeto que contém o tipo ACE.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref> that corresponds to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"> </xref> que corresponde do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref> object with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"> </xref> objeto com os valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object, such as an NTAccount object, that resolves to a security identifier (SID).
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objeto, como um objeto NTAccount, que resolve para um identificador de segurança (SID).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> bitmask that shows the access privileges to use.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>bitmask que mostra os privilégios de acesso para usar.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> object that indicates if ACEs are inherited.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Boolean>objeto que indica se as ACEs são herdadas.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>if ACEs are inherited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>Se as ACEs são herdadas; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref> object that contains inheritance flags for a directory object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"> </xref> objeto que contém os sinalizadores de herança para um objeto de diretório.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref> object that contains inheritance propagation flags for a directory object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"> </xref> objeto que contém sinalizadores de propagação de herança para um objeto de diretório.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> object that contains the ACE type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"> </xref> objeto que contém o tipo ACE.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> object that contains the GUID of the directory object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Guid>objeto que contém o GUID do objeto de diretório.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> object that contains the GUID of the inherited directory object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Guid>objeto que contém o GUID do objeto de diretório herdado.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref> that corresponds to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"> </xref> que corresponde do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> that represents an access rule for this object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Type>que representa uma regra de acesso para este objeto.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns the <xref:System.Type> of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule> class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade sempre retorna a <xref:System.Type>de que a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule>classe.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>da regra de acesso.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Adds an access rule to the DACL of an object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma regra de acesso para a DACL de um objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity.AddAccessRule*> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity.AddAccessRule*>do objeto ao qual essa operação se aplica.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity.AddAccessRule*>

trans-unit.source: Adds an audit rule to the SACL of an object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma regra de auditoria para SACL de um objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAuditRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAuditRule"> </xref> do objeto ao qual essa operação se aplica.

trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"> </xref> objeto com os valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified modification to the specified <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se a modificação especificada especificado <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type of access control modification to perform.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de modificação de controle de acesso para executar.

trans-unit.source: The access rule to modify.
trans-unit.target: A regra de acesso para modificar.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se modificado com êxito; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A modificação para aplicar.

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to modify.
trans-unit.target: A regra de auditoria para modificar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se modificado com êxito; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se modificado com êxito; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules associated with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as regras de acesso associadas ao <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> for which to remove all access rules.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> do qual remover todas as regras de acesso.

trans-unit.source: All access rules are not in canonical order.
trans-unit.target: Todas as regras de acesso não estão na ordem canônica.

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules associated with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as regras associadas especificado de auditoria <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> for which to remove all audit rules.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> do qual remover todas as regras de auditoria.

trans-unit.source: All audit rules are not in canonical order.
trans-unit.target: Todas as regras de auditoria não estão na ordem canônica.

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that have the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object and <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> object from the DACL of an object.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as regras de acesso que têm especificado <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objeto e <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"> </xref> objeto da DACL de um objeto.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object such as an NTAccount object, that resolves to a security identifier (SID).
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objeto como um objeto NTAccount, que resolve para um identificador de segurança (SID).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> object that contains the ACE type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"> </xref> objeto que contém o tipo ACE.

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified access rule from the DACL of an object.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as regras de acesso que contenham a mesma segurança acesso e o identificador de máscara como a regra de acesso especificado da DACL de um objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"> </xref> do objeto ao qual essa operação se aplica.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a operação for bem-sucedida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that exactly match the specified access rule from the DACL of an object.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as regras de acesso que correspondem exatamente à regra de acesso especificado da DACL de um objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"> </xref> do objeto ao qual essa operação se aplica.

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that have the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object from the SACL of an object.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as regras de auditoria que tem especificado <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objeto da SACL de um objeto.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object such as an NTAccount object, that resolves to a security identifier (SID).
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objeto como um objeto NTAccount, que resolve para um identificador de segurança (SID).

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) of an object.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as regras de auditoria que contém a mesma segurança acesso e o identificador de máscara como a regra de auditoria da SACL do sistema acesso controle de lista () de um objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"> </xref> do objeto ao qual essa operação se aplica.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a operação for bem-sucedida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that exactly match the specified audit rule from the SACL of an object.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as regras de auditoria que correspondem exatamente a regra de auditoria da SACL de um objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"> </xref> do objeto ao qual essa operação se aplica.

trans-unit.source: Searches an object's DACL for all access rules that contain a security identifier (SID) that matches the SID specified in the rule object, and replaces all of those access rules with the access rules that are contained in the rule object.
trans-unit.target: Todas as regras de acesso que contêm um identificador de segurança (SID) que corresponde o SID especificado na pesquisa DACL de um objeto o rule objeto e substitui todas as regras com as regras de acesso que estão contidas em de acesso a rule objeto.

trans-unit.source: When ResetAccessRule is used to replace all access rules with a particular SID in an object's DACL, both Allow- and Deny- type rules are replaced.
trans-unit.target: Quando ResetAccessRule é usado para substituir todas as regras de acesso um determinado SID DACL de um objeto, as regras de tipo de permitir e negar são substituídas.

trans-unit.source: To replace only Allow rules without affecting Deny rules, or to replace Deny rules without affecting Allow rules, use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity.SetAccessRule%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir apenas regras de permissão sem afetar as regras de negar ou substitui regras de negação sem afetar as regras de permissão, use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity.SetAccessRule%2A>em vez disso.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity.SetAccessRule%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"> </xref> do objeto ao qual essa operação se aplica.

trans-unit.source: Searches an object's DACL for all access rules that contain a security identifier (SID) that matches the SID specified in the rule object, and an access control type (Allow or Deny) that matches the type specified in the rule object, and replaces all of those access rules with the access rules that are contained in the rule object.
trans-unit.target: Todas as regras de acesso que contêm um identificador de segurança (SID) que corresponde o SID especificado na pesquisa DACL de um objeto o rule objeto e um tipo de controle de acesso (permitir ou negar) que corresponde ao tipo especificado no rule objeto e substitui todas as regras com as regras de acesso que estão contidas em de acesso a rule objeto.

trans-unit.source: When SetAccessRule is used to replace all access rules that match a particular SID and access control type (Allow or Deny) in an object's DACL, all rules in that DACL with an SID and type that match the SID and access control type contained in the `rule` object are replaced.
trans-unit.target: Quando SetAccessRule é usado para substituir todas as regras de acesso que correspondem a um SID específico e acessar o tipo de controle (permitir ou negar) DACL de um objeto, todas as regras em que a DACL com um SID e um tipo que corresponde a SID e o acesso controle tipo contido o `rule` objeto são substituídos.

trans-unit.source: Using this method, the developer can replace any Allow rules for that SID on that object without affecting existing Deny rules, or replace all Deny rules for that SID on that object without affecting existing Allow rules.
trans-unit.target: Usando esse método, o desenvolvedor pode substituir quaisquer regras de permissão para esse SID no objeto sem afetar as regras existentes de Deny ou substituir todas as regras de negação para esse SID no objeto sem afetar as regras de permissão existentes.

trans-unit.source: To replace all rules for that object pertaining to the specified SID, regardless of type, use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity.ResetAccessRule%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir todas as regras para esse objeto pertence ao SID especificado, independentemente do tipo, use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity.ResetAccessRule%2A>em vez disso.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity.ResetAccessRule%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"> </xref> do objeto ao qual essa operação se aplica.

trans-unit.source: Replaces all audit rules that contain the same security identifier as the specified audit rule in the SACL of an object with the specified audit rule.
trans-unit.target: Substitui todas as regras de auditoria que contêm o mesmo identificador de segurança que a regra de auditoria da SACL de um objeto com a regra de auditoria.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"> </xref> do objeto ao qual essa operação se aplica.
